context.original_request: Redesign agent and skill modals based on content available
accumulated_decisions: Agent modal emphasizes personality: avatar, name/role, tools, key phrases
Skill modal emphasizes data flow: command ID, backing agent, handoff visualization, stats
Both share 4px domain accent bar at top for color coding
Handoff flow uses visual diagram with nodes and SVG connectors
Stats displayed in two-column grid with large numbers
constraints: Implement within existing dashboard CSS architecture
Ensure accessibility (ARIA, keyboard nav, color contrast)
SVG connectors for handoff flow diagram
